Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Butterball \But"ter*ball`\, n. (Zo["o]l.) 1. The buffel duck. [1913 Webster]
2. a fat person or animal. [informal] [PJC]
3. a lump of butter rounded into a ball. [PJC]
4. [Trademark] a plump chicken or turkey prepared for cooking. [PJC]

butterball n 1: a rotund individual [syn: {fatso}, {fatty}, {fat person}, {roly-poly}] [ant: {thin person}] 2: small North American diving duck; males have bushy head plumage [syn: {bufflehead}, {dipper}, {Bucephela albeola}]
